original_title: Final rites for late Mahanayaka thera
original_body_lines: Final rites for late Mahanayaka thera The final religious rights for the late Mahanayaka of Amarapura Chapter the most Venerable Dodampahala Chandrasiri Thera was observed at Independence Square today with the participation of Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardene, Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardene, several ministers and MPs. Pix by Kithsiri De Mel
